meanings.definition: A cyclic organic compound with the formula (NHCO)₂CH₂. It is also known as barbituric acid.
meanings.english_definition: A cyclic organic compound with the formula (NHCO)₂CH₂. It is also known as barbituric acid.

examples.sentence: Malonylurea is the parent compound of barbiturates.
examples.translation: マロニル尿素は、バルビツール酸塩の親化合物です。
